newsitem.title: POLAND: ING Barings rates Jelfa as accumulate.
newsitem.headline: ING Barings rates Jelfa as accumulate.

text.p: ING Baring Securities Limited rated Polish pharmeceuticals firm Jelfa SA as accumulate, saying the company was likely to increase its ernings by 38 percent this year, ING Baring said in its April report.

ING Baring said in its Eastern European Research it expected Jelfa's 1997 net profit to rise to 28.2 million zlotys from 20.4 million last year on sales of 184.5 million zlotys up from 148.9 million last year.
It said Jelfa was valued at 15.1 1997 earnings, which made it look attractive.
"We believe this is not fully discounted by the market and provides for a 10-15 percent price appreciation over the next three months," it said.
Jelfa was trading at 66.5 zlotys on April 21 when the report was issued. It traded at 66 zlotys on Tuesday.
